boardgame.description: From the description on the box:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;A fistful of dice to roll. Challenging cards to build them on. Fast-moving play and shifting strategies. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s a good bet Sharp Shooters will be your favorite dice game ever._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players roll dice to build rows on a common card. Win chips by placing the last die in a row. Score for straights, full houses, 4 of a kind, and more._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Every turn is a brand new challenge. How many dice will you place, and where? Will you risk another roll?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As the card builds, so does the tension. Can you keep point-snatching opponents from finishing rows? To win, have the most points when the game ends!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Games Magazine's 1996 Game of the Year. Each player, armed with a fistful of dice, starts his turn by rolling 5 dice and placing as many of them as possible on a card, though you must always place at least one if you can. Each card has 6 rows, with from 1 to six dice pictured in each row. These are in various combinations, and dice must be placed in order in each row. As long as you place at least one die, and you have not used all of your 5 dice, you can then choose to roll again. If you choose to stop, or you roll dice with no legal placement available, your turn is over._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Scoring is achieved by placing the last die in a row and scoring can be a negative. When the last row of a card is scored it is removed and a new card replaces it. Play until a predetermined number of cards are scored._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Won Games Magazine Game of the Year award in 1995._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Reimplemented as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Royal Casino_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; by Ravensburger_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 1995 Games Magazine Game of the Year Winner

Sharpshooters Dice Game Risk _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Roll to Rake in the Chips This game is used but complete! Components in very good condition! A fistful of dice to roll. Challenging cards to build them on. Fast-moving play and shifting strategies. It’s a good bet Sharp Shooters will be your favorite dice game ever! Every turn is a brand-new challenge. How many dice will you place, and where? Will you risk another roll? Contains the following components in very good condition: 32 dice 94 plastic chips in denominations of 10. 50 and 100. Rollilng tray Card holder 12 two-sided cards Instructions Label has been applied to the rolling tray The game box shows obvious wear along the edges and corners, one corner slightly torn; light scratches and a few little dings on the top; clear tape remnants. This is a pretty heavy game with a shipping weight of four pounds, from my zip of 98338. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll pay for delivery confirmation. I will ship world-wide.
